General.Name: Mr. Blue Corporation
General.Description: Mr. Blue Corporation operates as an entertainment company in South Korea and internationally. The company produces and distributes comics, cartoons, web novels, and webtoons, as well as cartoon e-books. It supplies its products through mrblue.com; and platforms, such as Naver, Kakao, Nate, and Google Books. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Mr. Blue Building, Seoul, South Korea
